message.body: Are we still on for dinner on Tues? Providing we survive the storm.
Absolutely! I'm really looking forward to it
Me too. Do you think we should call for a reservation?
I've never been there, so I have no idea. Feel free if you think we should
Wow! I thought you had been there before. Now I'm really excited. I doubt we need a ressie for a Tue but I guess it wouldn't hurt what time were you thinking?
I can probably be home and ready to go by 6 at the latest. Any time after that
